subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Scott Olsen had a double, a single and a run batted in, all while taking a two-hit shutout into the sixth inning and helping the Florida Marlins beat the Nationals, 9-3, last night in Washington. Florida improved to 2-0 for only the second time in its 15 seasons.
